statement.p: Out of the last 40 days, it rained 18 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{18}}{{40}}={0.45}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.45}={45} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 45 .
